participant_1.background:
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
i sing in the shower.
i get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
my wife is a college professor.
regular life disappoints me.

participant_2.background:
I have an odd schedule since I'm a night owl, but I still get my work done.
i love to listen to religious music.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
i work in it.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.

content.text: Hi there! What kind of music are you into?
I love all types of music, but I especially love religious music.
That's cool. I have to admit, I don't listen to a lot of religious music. What kind of artists do you like?
I love listening to Hillsong Worship.
I've heard of them, but I haven't listened to their music much. What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song by them is "Oceans."
I'll have to check it out. I love the name. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
It is! I love singing it in the shower.
Singing in the shower is the best. It's the only time I can really let loose and sing my heart out.
Me too! I love belting out the lyrics to my favorite songs.
Do you have any other hobbies besides listening to music?
I love to practice bird calls. I'm not very good at it, but it's a lot of fun.
That's really cool! I've never met anyone who practices bird calls before.
It's a lot of fun. I love listening to the different bird calls and trying to imitate them.
I bet it is! I love listening to bird calls too. They're so beautiful.
They are! I love the way they can make you feel at peace.
